# Draft:Shakuntla Bhagwaria (politician)

----
Shakuntla Bhagwaria (born 02 April 1941) is an Indian politician from Haryana. She is a four-time Member of the Legislative Assembly (MLA) for the Bawal Assembly constituency in the Rewari district and a former Minister in the Government of Haryana.
Political Career
Shakuntla Bhagwaria was first elected to the Haryana Legislative Assembly from the Bawal constituency. She was subsequently re-elected multiple times and, during her tenure, served as a Minister in the Government of Haryana.
In the lead-up to the 2005 Haryana Legislative Assembly election, Bhagwaria, who was then the Vice-President of the Haryana Pradesh Congress Committee (HPCC) and a former minister, was denied the INC ticket for Bawal. She openly rebelled against the party's decision.
She instead contested the 2005 election as an independent candidate and won the seat with 38,153 votes, defeating the INC candidate.
